src_text: kamora hore diteko di ba fumane ba tshwaetsehile, ba ile ba itsheka thajana ka boraro ba bona lapeng.
tgt_text: "sazivalela kwigumbi lethu lokulala, ngelixa umazala wam onesifo seswekile kunye noxinzelelo lwegazi kwaye ngethamsanqa zange osuleleke yintsholongwane – yena wayekhathalela abanye babantwana bethu ababini," utsho umohammed.

src_text: "re ile ra itsheka thajana ka phaposing ya rona ya ho robala, ha ka ho le leng mme matsale wa ka, ya nang le lefu la tswekere le kgatello e hodimo ya madi empa ka lehlohonolo ha a ka a tshwaetseha ke kokwanahloko ena, o ile a hlokomela bana ba bang ba rona ba babedi," ho rialo mohammed.
tgt_text: ngokwesebe lezempilo lasentshona koloni, abantu abanoxinzelelo lwegazi, abanesifo seswekile kunye nesifo sezintso esinganyangekiyo baphakathi kwabantu abanezifo ezinganyangekiyo abangabona bahlaselwa lula yicovid19.

src_text: ho ya ka lefapha la bophelo bo botle la kapa bophirimela, batho ba nang le kgatello e hodimo ya madi, lefu la tswekere le lefu la diphio le sa foleng, ke ba bang ba bakudi ba nang le mafu a diqebo ba tlwaelehileng ka ho fetisisa ho covid19.
tgt_text: ukususela kumhla wama25 kucanzibe, abantu abanezi zigulo zilandelayo babonisa iimpawu ezinobuzaza: uxinzelelo lwegazi, iipesenti ezingama58 isifo seswekile, iipesenti ezingama56 isifo sezintso esinganyangekiyo, iipesenti ezili17 isandulelangculazi (ihiv), iipesenti ezili16 isifo sombefu okanye isifo esinganyangekiyo sesifuba, iipesenti ezili15 isifo sentliziyo, iipesenti ezili11 ukutyeba kakhulu, iipesenti ezili13 isifo sephepha, iipesenti ezili13 isifo somhlaza, iipesenti ezimbini ezinye izigulo ezinganyangekiyo, iipesenti ezili16.

src_text: ho tloha mohla la 25 motsheanong, batho ba nang le mafu a diqebo a latelang ba bontshitse matshwao a mpefetseng: kgatello e hodimo ya madi, ke 58% lefu la tswekere, ke 56% lefu la diphio le sa foleng, ke 17% hiv , ke 16% letshweya kapa lefu le sa foleng le amanang le ho phefumoloha, ke 15% lefu la pelo, ke 11% botenya bo fetisisang, ke 13% lefuba, ke 13% mofetshe, ke 2% mafu a mang a diqebo, ke 16%.
tgt_text: umohammed uthi eyona nto yayimoyikisa kakhulu yayiliphika elalibangelwa yicovid19.

src_text: mohammed o re ntho eo a neng a e tshaba ka ho fetisisa e ne e le ya ho thatafallwa ke ho phefumoloha ka lebaka la covid19.
tgt_text: "bendisiva ukudinwa kakhulu, ukukhohlela nokuminxeka kwesifuba, inqawe yam yombefu ibikunceda oku.

src_text: "ke ile ka ba le mokgathala, ka hohlola ka ba ka bipetsana sefuba, e leng mathata a ileng a rarollwa ke peipi ya ka ya letshweya.
tgt_text: iimpawu zam zazingena buzaza kakhulu njengezomyeni wam, ebenomzimba obuhlungu, enesicafucafu, isifuba esivalekileyo, ukuphelelwa ngumoya, ukuvaleka kwempumlo namarhanana, izikhohlela ezisesifubeni sakhe kunye nomkhuhlane.

src_text: matshwao a ka a ne a se mabe jwaloka a monna wa ka, ya neng a opelwa ke mmele, a nyekelwa ke pelo, a bipetsane sefuba, a fellwa ke moya, a kwalehile dinko, a na le leleta ka sefubeng esita le feberu.
tgt_text: unyana wam ebenomkhuhlane iintsuku ezintathu, kodwa waphila ngokukhawuleza nje zakuba ziphelile iimpawu," utshilo.

src_text: mora wa ka yena o bile le feberu ka matsatsi a mararo, empa a hlaphohelwa ka potlako hang ha a se a hlotse matshwao ana," o rialo.
tgt_text: usapho lwakamohammed beluthobele iinkqubo zococeko emsebenzini nasekhaya, ukuphepha ukosuleleka yintsholongwane.

src_text: ba lelapa la mahommed ba ne ba tsitlallela ditsamaiso tsohle tsa bohlweki ha ba le mosebetsing le lapeng, e le ho qoba ho tshwaetseha ke kokwanahloko ena.
tgt_text: "usapho lwam beluqonda, lukhathala kwaye lusixhasa, kwaye belusiphathela isidlo sangokuhlwa rhoqo ebusuku, kodwa ngamanye amaxesha abantu basekuhlaleni basenokungakhathali kwaye ubuhlungu obenziwa kumakhasi onxibelelwano oluntu buyoyikeka," utsho umohammed.

src_text: "ba leloko ba ne ba utlwisisa, mme ba re tsotella ba bile ba re tshehetsa, ebile ba ne ba re tlisetsa selallo phirimaneng enngwe le enngwe, empa ka dinako tse ding setjhaba sa heno se ka nka dintho hanyane mme tshenyo e etswang ho marangrang a dikgokahano tsa setjhaba e a tshosa," ho rialo mohammed.
tgt_text: isebe lezempilo lasentshona koloni lithi ukuzigcina usela amanzi rhoqo kunye nokujonga iglucose egazini lakho, uxinzelelo lwegazi kunye neqondo lobushushu emzimbeni zizinto eziphambili ekulawuleni icovid19, ingakumbi kubantu abanezigulo ezinganyangekiyo.

src_text: lefapha la bophelo bo botle la kapa bophirimela le re ho nwa metsi a lekaneng le ho alosa tswekere e mading, kgatello ya madi le motjheso ke dintho tsa bohlokwa taolong ya covid19, haholoholo bakuding ba nang le mafu a diqebo.
tgt_text: ukongeza, isebe licebisa abantu abanezigulo ezinganyangekiyo: ukusela amayeza akho ngokuchanekileyo, njengoko kuchaziwe ngugqirha wezempilo.

src_text: ho eketsa moo, lefapha le eletsa batho ba nang le mafu a diqebo: ho nwa dipidisi le meriana ka nepo, jwaloka ha o laetswe ke ngaka.
tgt_text: ukuhlamba izandla zakho ngesepha namanzi ubuncinane imizuzwana engama20, ngaphambi kokuphatha naliphi na iyeza.

src_text: ho hatlela matsoho a hao kgafetsa ka sesepa le metsi ka metsotswana e 20 bonnyane, pele o tshwara dipidisi kapa meriana.
tgt_text: ukungayeki ukusela iyeza ngaphandle kokuba uxelelwe ngugqirha wezempilo kwaye ungaze wabelane nomnye umntu ngamayeza.

src_text: ho se tlohele ho nwa dipidisi le meriana, ntle le ha ngaka e o laela jwalo, mme o se ke wa arolelana dipidisi le meriana le mang kapa mang.
tgt_text: ukuzama ukuzivocavoca imizuzu engama30 ngosuku.

src_text: ho leka ho kwetlisa mmele ka metsotso e 30 ka letsatsi.
tgt_text: isebe lithi abantu abanesifo seswekile banamathuba amaninzi okufumana iingxaki ezinzima kwicovid19, kodwa umngcipheko wokugula kakhulu uphantsi ukuba isifo seswekile siyalawuleka.

src_text: lefapha le re batho ba nang le lefu la tswekere ba kotsing e kgolo ya ho ba le matshwao a mpefetseng a covid19, empa kotsi ya hore ba kule haholo e a fokola haeba lefu la bona la tswekere le le taolong e ntle.
tgt_text: "ngokubanzi, abantu abanesifo seswekile ngabona banokuba neempawu eziqatha nezinzima xa bosulelwe yintsholongwane.

src_text: "ka kakaretso, batho ba nang le lefu la tswekere ke bona ba kotsing e kgolo ya ho ba le matshwao a mpefetseng haeba ba tshwaetsehile ke kokwanahloko ena.
tgt_text: njengoko abantu abanesifo seswekile besebungozini becovid19 eqatha nje, ukungasondelelani nabantu okanye ukubambana kuyacetyiswa apho kukho imfuneko khona.

src_text: jwaloka ha batho ba nang le lefu la tswekere ba le kotsing e kgolo ya covid19 e mpefetseng, ho kgothalletswa hore ba tsitlallele ho qaqolohana le batho ba bang moo ho kgonehang.
tgt_text: ukutyeba nako kungumngcipheko oqatha wecovid19.

src_text: ho nona haholo ke enngwe ntho e kotsi bakeng sa covid19 e mpefetseng.
tgt_text: ukuthoba ubunzima bomzimba, ukuba kuyenzeka kuyakhuthazwa.

src_text: ho kgothalletswa hore ho fokotswe mmele, haeba ho kgoneha.
tgt_text: ukuba ngumqabaqaba emva kokuzigcina bucala iintsuku ezili14, umohammed wabuyela emsebenzini.

src_text: "bopaki ba ho phela hantlekamora boitsheko ba matsatsi a 14, mohammed o ile a kgutlela mosebetsing.
tgt_text: uthi ukuphila kwakhe emva kwentsholongwane kuyitshintshile inkqubo yokucinga kunye nemibono yakhe ngobomi.

src_text: o re ho hlaphohelwa kokwanahlokong ena ho ile ha fetola mokgwa oo a nahanang ka wona le oo a shebang bophelo ka wona.
tgt_text: "ukuqonda kakhulu ukubaluleka koosapho lwakho kunye nezinto ezincinci ebomini.

src_text: "o bo bona hantle le ho feta bohlokwa ba lelapa la hao esita le dintho tse nyane bophelong.
tgt_text: ndifuna abantu nakweyiphi indawo abasebenza kuyo bathathe uxanduva ngeempilo zabo kwaye bafundise iintsapho zabo nabantwana babo, ingakumbi njengokuba abantwana bebuyele esikolweni.

src_text: ke batla hore batho ba tikolohong efe kapa efe ya mosebetsing ba nke boikarabelo ka maphelo a bona ba be ba rute ba malapa a bona le bana, haholoholo nakong ena hobane bana ba kgutletse dikolong.
tgt_text: "nceda umntwana wakho afumane iindlela ezinobuchule ngokubonisa uthando kwizihlobo zabo, ngaphandle kokusondelelana kunye nokubambana.

src_text: "thusa ngwana wa hao hore a fumane mekgwa e hlamaselang ya ho bontsha mosa metswalleng ya hae, ntle le ho atamelana kapa ho thetsana le bona.
tgt_text: yenza usapho lwakho luzicoce ngesibulalantsholongwane ngaphambi kokuba lungene endlwini, lushiye izihlangu zalo egaraji ukuba luyakwazi, khulula zonke iimpahla zakho uze uhlambe ngaphambi kokubulisa usapho lwakho futhi qaphela impilo ukuze ubakhusele," utsho.

src_text: kgothalletsa ba lelapa la hao ho bolaya dikokwanahloko pele ba kena ka tlung, siya dieta ka karatjhe haeba o kgona, hlobola diaparo tsohle mme o itlhatswe pele o dumedisa ba lelapa la hao mme o be sedi le ho feta e le ho ba tshireletsa," o rialo.
tgt_text: isebe licebisa abantu abanezigulo ezinganyangekiyo ukuba batye ukutya okusempilweni, bazivocavoce rhoqo, bangazifukami izinto ezibakhathaza umphefumlo, basebenzise okanye basele amayeza ngokufanelekileyo baze balandele onke amanyathelo othintelo ayimfuneko.

src_text: lefapha le kgothalletsa batho ba nang le mafu a diqebo hore ba je dijo tse nang le phepo e ntle, ba ikwetlise kgafetsa, ba laole dikgatello tsa bona maikutlo, ba tsitlallele tshebediso ya dipidisi le meriana ya bona ka nepo, ba be ba ipapise le mehato yohle e hlokehang ya boipaballo.
tgt_text: vnqa zange osuleleke yintsholongwane – yena wayekhathalela abanye babantwana bethu ababini," utsho umohammed.

src_text: vtsale wa ka, ya nang le lefu la tswekere le kgatello e hodimo ya madi empa ka lehlohonolo ha a ka a tshwaetseha ke kokwanahloko ena, o ile a hlokomela bana ba bang ba rona ba babedi," ho rialo mohammed.
tgt_text: ngokwesebe lezempilo lasentshona koloni, abantu abanoxinzelelo lwegazi, abanesifo seswekile kunye nesifo sezi ukutyeba kakhulu, iipesenti ezili13 kunye nomkhuhlane.

src_text: hiv , ke 16% letshweya kapa lefu le sa foleng le amanang le ho mmele, a nyekelwa ke pelo, a bipetsane sefuba, a fellwa ke moya, a kwalehile dinko, a na le leleta ka sefubeng esita le feberu.
tgt_text: unyana wam ebenomkhuhlane iintsuku ezintathu, kodwa waphila ngokukhawuleza nje zakuba ziphelile iimpawu," utshilo.

src_text: mora wa ka yena o bile le feberu ka matsatsi a mararo, empa a hlaphohelwa ka potlako hang ha a se a hlotse matshwao ana," o rialo.
tgt_text: usapho lwakamohammed beluthobele iinkqubo zococeko emsebenzini nasekhaya, ukuphepha ukosuleleka yintsholongwane.

src_text: ba lelapa la mahommed ba ne ba tsitlallela ditsamaiso tsohle tsa bohlweki ha ba le mosebetsing le lapeng, e le ho qoba ho tshwaetseha ke kokwanahloko ena.
tgt_text: "usapho lwam beluqonda, lukhathala kwaye lusixhasa, kwaye belusiphathela isidlo sangokuhlwa rhoqo uinsaaf mohammed onesifo sombefu, ukwazile ukuyoyisa icovid19 .

src_text: "ba leloko ba ne ba insaaf mohammed, ya nang le letshweya, o kgonne ho hlola covid19 .
tgt_text: umama onesigulo esinganyangekiyo uyoyisile icovid19 silusapho nyanda uinsaaf mohammed uthi kubaluleke kakhulu ukuba abemi bomzantsi afrika ingakumbi abo banezigulo ezinganyangekiyo ukuba bathathe uxanduva lwempilo yabo.

src_text: tlotlo e kgethehileng ho basebetsi ba habo rona ba tlhokomelo ya bophelo bo botle vukuzenzele unnamed lenane la batho ba bolailweng ke kokwanahloko ya corona le sa tswa feta ho 2 000. ho bao ba hlokahetseng, ho teng basebetsi ba tlhokomelo ya bophelo bo botle, le baporofeshenale ba tswileng matsoho ba neng ba hlokomela bakudi, bao e neng e le batshehetsi le batshedisi ho bao ba dipetlele ba tshekilweng ho ba malapa a bona.
tgt_text: imbeko ekhethekileyo kubasebenzi bethu benkathalelo yezempilo vukuzenzele unnamed inani lokusweleka okubangelwa yintsho longwane icorona kutsha nje lide ledlula kuphawu lwama2 000. phakathi kwabo bathe baphulukana nobomi babo ngabasebenzi bezempilo, abasebenzi abafezekileyo abebekhathalela abagulayo, kwaye bebeyinkxaso nentuthuzelo kwabo bebesesibhedlele besenziwa amakheswa kwiintsapho zabo.

src_text: taba ya hore banna le basadi ba sebetsang mosebetsi ona o babatsehang ba qetella ba kula ba be ba shwe, ke ntho e thefulang haholo.
tgt_text: le yokuba amadoda naba setyhini benza le misebenzi iphakamileyo nendilisekile kangaka babe bona kuqala begula bade basweleke sisithonga esibuhlungu eso.

src_text: ke bona ba tshwereng teu twantshong ya sewa sena.
tgt_text: ngabo abangabona baphambili edabini lokulwa nalo bhubhane.

src_text: ba sebetsa tlasa kgatello e kgolo ba bile ba tlameha le ho jara morwalo o boima maikutlong a bona, morwalo wa ho tseba hore ba kotsing ya ho tshwaetswa ke kokwanahloko ena.
tgt_text: basebenza phantsi koxinizelelo olukhulu kuze kufuneke ukuba bathwale ubunzi ma bengqondo bokwazi ukuba basemngciphekweni wokosulelwa yile ntsholongwane.

src_text: ba fela e le bahale ba sebele lepatlelong la twantsho ya kokwanahloko ena ya corona .
tgt_text: bangamaqhawe namaqhawekazi okwenene wedabi lethu lokulwa intsholongwane icorona .

src_text: re a rolela kgaebana maafrika borwa a sebete a siyang metse ya ona, ba malapa le baratuwa ba bona e le hore ba ilo itlaleha mesebetsing kamehla ditleliniking, dipetlele le ditsing tse ding tsa kokelo ntle le tikatiko.
tgt_text: siwothulela umnqwazi la makhalipha abemi bomzantsi afrika ashiya amakhaya wabo, iintsapho kunye nabo babathandayo ukuya empangelweni engaphosi nomzuzu yonke imihla kwiikliniki, izibhedlele kunye namanye amaziko ezempilo.

src_text: dibakeng tseo ba sebetsang ho tsona ba fana ka tlhokomelo ya bongaka, tshehetso ya botsamaisi le ditshebeletso tse ding tse kang tsa tlhwekiso le mepheo.
tgt_text: apho bathi babonelele khona ngenkathalelo yezempilo, inkxaso yobumabhalana nezinye iinkonzo ezifana nokucoca nokulungiselela ukutya.

src_text: jwaloka ha ba phetha mesebetsi ya diporofeshene tsa bona, le rona re na le boikarabelo ba rona ho bona le ba malapa a bona.
tgt_text: njengokuba besenza oko kungumsebenzi wobizo lwabo, nathi sinoxanduva kubo neentsapho zabo.

src_text: bophelo ba bona le polokeho ya bona di tlameha ho bewa ka sehlohlolong.
tgt_text: impilo yabo nokhuseleko lwabo kufuneka siyixabise kakhulu.

src_text: re a ba tlotla ebile re a ba tshehetsa e le banna le basadi ba bontshitseng hore ba ikemiseditse ho bea maphelo a bona kotsing ho etsetsa hore rona re phele.
tgt_text: sibanika imbeko siba bekela phezulu njengamadoda nabasetyhini ababonakalise ukuba bazimisele ukubeka ubomi babo emngciphekweni ukuze kuphile thina.

src_text: bakeng sa hore ba phethe mosebetsi ona wa bona o boimahadi, ba hloka tshehetso ya rona esita le tshireletso ka hore ba fuwe disebediswa tsa boitshireletso (dippe).
tgt_text: ukuze bakwazi ukwenza lo msebenzi mkhulu kangaka ufuna amandla badinga inkxaso yethu kwakunye nokhuseleko ngokubonelelwa ngezixhobo zokusebenza ezikhuselekileyo (iippe).

src_text: ka tshehetso ya letlole la tshe hetsano le dinyehelo tse tswang ho maafrika borwa a mangata ka bomong, dikgwebong, matloleng a ikemetseng le mebusong e meng, re kgonne ho reka dippe bakeng sa basebetsi bana ba sebete ba tshwereng teu.
tgt_text: ngenkxaso yesolidarity fund nezipho ezivela kubantu ngabantu basemzantsi afrika, kumashishini, kwiingxowamali nakoorhulumente bamanye amazwe, sikwazile ukufumanela aba basebenzi bangabona baphambili edabini bakhaliphileyo izixhobo zokusebenza ezikhuselekileyo.

src_text: moo ho bileng le kgaello ya dippe, dipetlele tsa rona di phahametse mapoqo ho netefatsa hore di a fumaneha.
tgt_text: apho bekukho khona ukudingeka kweppe izibhedlele zethu zikulungisa ngokukhawuleza oko ukuqinisekisa ukuba zikhona.

src_text: re a tseba hore phihlello ya dippe ha se yona feela qholotso eo basebetsi ba habo rona ba bophelo bo botle ba tobaneng le yona.
tgt_text: siyayazi ukuba ukufikelela kwippe asikokuphela komce limngeni abasebenzi bethu benkathalelo yezempilo abajongene nawo.

src_text: ditleliniki le dipetlele naha ka bophara di tobane le kgaello ya basebetsi.
tgt_text: kweli lizwe jikelele iikliniki nezibhedlele zijongene nokudingeka kwabasebenzi.

src_text: ho se ho ntse ho henahenanwa le bothata bona.
tgt_text: le ngxaki iyalungiswa.

src_text: e le ho tshehetsa mosebetsi oo basebetsi ba habo rona ba tshwereng teu ba o etsang naha ka bophara, re romela matona le batlatsi ba matona seterekeng ka seng naheng ena hore ba ilo inwesa ka nkgo ka diqholotso tse qollehileng tse teng diterekeng tseo, esita le ho sebetsa le ba apesitsweng matla ho tsa bophelo bo botle diprovenseng.
tgt_text: ukuxhasa umsebenzi owenzi wa nga basebenzi bethu abanga bona baphambili edabini kweli lizwe jikelele sithumela abaphathiswa noosekela baphathiswa kwisithili ngasinye kweli lizwe ukuze babe nokuzibonela ngokwabo imicelimngeni ngobunjalo bayo kwezi zithili ukuze base benzisane nabasemagunyeni kwezempilo kula maphondo.

src_text: re tshwanela ho sebetsa mmo ho hore re tshireletse bophelo bo botle e seng ba basebetsi ba habo rona ba tshwereng teu feela, empa ba basebetsi ka kakaretso.
tgt_text: kufanele sisebenze kunye ukukhusela hayi nje kuphela impilo yabasebenzi abangabona baphambili edabini kodwa bonke nje abasebenzi.

src_text: ho se ho e na le mosebetsi o kgabane o entsweng ke mekgatlo ya basebetsi, wa ho ruta ditho tsa yona ka taolo ya kokwanahloko ena le thibelo ya yona le bohlweki.
tgt_text: imibutho yabasebenzi sele yenze umsebenzi omhle wokufundisa amalungu malunga nokulawula nokuthintela usuleleko nococeko.

src_text: mekgatlo ena e boetse e tshehetsa mosebetsi wa lefapha la kgiro le bosebetsi ho phetheng bohlahlobi dibakeng tsa tshebetso, e le ho netefatsa hore ditsamaiso tsa bophelo bo botle le polokeho di kentswe tshebetsong molemong wa basebetsi ba kgutlelang mesebetsing.
tgt_text: ikwaxhasa nomsebenzi wesebe lezengqesho nezemisebenzi ekwenzeni uhlolo lwasemsebenzini ukuqinisekisa ukuba imimiselo yezempilo nokhuseleko iyalandelwa kubasebenzi ababuyela emsebenzini.

src_text: boholo ba mekgatlo ya basebetsi bo boetse bo fana ka lesedi le amanang le kokwanahloko ya corona ho ditho tsa yona, athe le basebetsi le bona ba etsa matsholo a tlhokomediso.
tgt_text: uninzi lwemibutho yethu yabasebenzi ikwabonelela ngolwazi lwentsholongwane icorona kumalungu wayo kwaye abaqeshi benza amaphulo okuqondisa.

src_text: enngwe ya diqholotso tse ropohileng naheng ya rona ke ya ho bewa sepha ha batho ba nang le tshwaetso ya kokwanahloko ya corona .
tgt_text: omnye wemicelimngeni othe wavela kweli lizwe lethu kukubekwa ibala kwabo bantu bathe bafunyaniswa benayo intsholongwane icorona.

src_text: re le setjhaba re na le boikarabelo ka kopanelo, ba ho fedisa ho bewa sepha ha batho ba tshwaetsehileng ke kokwanahloko ya corona .
tgt_text: siluluntu, sinoxanduva oludibeneyo lokukuncothula nengcambu ukubeka ibala abantu abosulelwe yintsholongwane icorona .

src_text: ho bile le ditlaleho tse nyarosang tsa batho ba hoboswang dibakeng tseo ba dulang ho tsona, esita le tsa setjhaba se ipelaetsang kgahlanong le bakudi ba kokwanahloko ya corona ba amohelwang dipetleleng le ditleliniking.
tgt_text: kubekho iingxelo ezihluphayo zabantu abasikiweyo kuluntu abahlala nalo kunye noluntu oluqhankqalazayo kuba izigulana ezinentsholongwane icorona zilaliswa kwizibhedlele zasekuhlaleni nasezikliniki.

src_text: ntho ena e tlameha ho fela.
tgt_text: lo nto leyo mayiphele.

src_text: jwaloka ha re ile ra ipopa ngatana nngwe ho kgothaletsa kamohelo ya batho ba nang le hiv ra ba ra lomahanya meno kgahlanong le hore batho ba etswe diphofu, re tshwanela ho bontsha kutlwisiso, mamello, mosa le kutlwelanobohloko ho bao ba tshwaetsehileng ke kokwanahloko ena le bakeng sa malapa a bona.
tgt_text: njengoko sasidibene ukukhuthaza ukwamkelwa kwabantu abaphila nentsholongwane kagawulayo (ihiv) saze sema saluqilima ukulwa ukungcungcuthekiswa kwabo, kufuneka sibonakalise ukuqonda, unya mezelwano, inceba, uvelwano nemfesane kwabo bosulelweyo yile ntsholongwane neentsapho zabo.

src_text: ho utlwisa bohloko ho tseba hore taba ena ya ho bewa sepha e susumetswa ke tshabo ya ho tshwaetswa ke lefu lena esita le ke kgaello ya kutlwisiso.
tgt_text: kuthiwa oku kubekwa kwebala kuqhutywa luloyiko lokosulelwa sesi sifo nokuswela ukuqonda.

src_text: mokgwa o motle ka ho fetisisa wa ho fenya tlholeho ya rona ya ho tshaba mafu le ditshwaetso, ke ho ikobela ditsamaiso tse teng tsa bohlweki.
tgt_text: eyona ndlelaingcono yokoyisa uloyiko lokugula olubangelwa lithuku lemvelo nesifo esosulelayo kukuthobela imimiselo yezempilo ekhoyo.

src_text: tshabo ya tshwaetso e na le mabaka a utlwahalang ebile ke nnete.
tgt_text: uloyiko losuleleko luyavakala kwaye lukhona.

src_text: ka ho tshwanang, re tseba seo re tshwanelang ho se etsa hore re itshireletse re be re sireletse le ba bang.
tgt_text: kwangaxesha nye, siyayazi ukuba yinto emasiyenze ukuzikhusela nokukhusela abanye.

src_text: re a tseba hore na kokwanahloko ena e bakwa ke eng, esita le seo re ka se etsang ho itshireletsa hore re se ke ra tshwaetseha.
tgt_text: siyayazi ukuba ibangelwa yintoni le ntsholongwane nokuthi yintoni esinokuyenza uku zikhusela ukuba singosuleleki.

src_text: re a tseba hore re tshwanela ho dula re qaqolohane re le batho, le hore re itsheke thajana haeba re ile ra atamelana le bao ba tshwaetsehileng esita le hore re itlalehe dipetlele haeba re na le matshwao.
tgt_text: siyayazi ukuba kufanele sigcine umgama wokuqelelana, ukuzigcina singamakheswa ukuba besidibene nabo bosulelekileyo nokuthi sizise esibhedlele ukuba sineempawu.

src_text: re tlameha hore re nne re tswele pele ho tataiswa ke nnete, e seng ke hlokwana la tsela.
tgt_text: kufuneka siqhubeke sikhokelwa yinyaniso hayi amarhe.

src_text: e fetile nako eo ka yona mang kapa mang a neng a ka re ha ho motho eo a mo tsebang ya tshwaetsehileng kapa ya anngweng ke kokwanahloko ya corona .
tgt_text: ixesha lokuba umntu athi aka zi mntu owosulelweyo okanye ochatshazelweyo yintsholongwane icorona ledlula kudala.

src_text: mothating wa jwale, ho feta neng kapa neng pejana, metswalle ya rona, ba leloko, basebetsimmoho le baahisane, ba hloka kutlwelobohloko le tshehetso ya rona.
tgt_text: ngoku, ngaphezulu kunakuqala, abahlobo bethu, iintsapho, oogxa nabamelwane bethu badinga uvelwano nenkxaso.

src_text: matsatsing a tlang, dibekeng tse tlang le dikgweding tse tlang, ka dinako tse ding re tla iphumana re nyahame re bile re tshohile ha re ntse re bona manane a batho ba tshwaetsehang le ba shwang a ntse a tswelapele ho eketseha.
tgt_text: kwiintsuku, iiveki nezi nyanga ziphambi kwethu, ngamanye amaxesha siza kuzifumana siphelelwa lithemba kwaye sibe noloyiko xa sibona inani labantu abosulelekayo nababhubhayo liqhubeka ukonyuka.

src_text: ho ka nna ha etsahala hore jwale dintho di mpefetse le ho feta, empa re na le bonnete ba hore di tla boela di ntlafala.
tgt_text: kusenokuba izinto zibe mbi ngakumbi, kodwa siqinisekile ukuba ziza kuba ngcono.

src_text: baeletsi ba rona ba tsa saense le tsa bongaka ba re bolelletse hore sekgahla sa ditshwaetso se tla nyoloha ha re ntse re atamela qhoweng ya rona.
tgt_text: oosonzululwazi bethu nabacebisi bezonyango basixelele ukuba izinga losule leko liza kunyuka njengoko sifikelela encotsheni yethu.

src_text: empa qetellong se tla boela se theoha.
tgt_text: kodwa ngokuqinisekileyo liza kuhla.

src_text: re tlotla basebetsi ba tsa bophelo bo botle ba lahlehetsweng ke maphelo a bona ka lebaka la ho hlokomela bakudi.
tgt_text: sinika imbeko abasebenzi benkathalelo yezempilo abathe baphulukana nobomi babo benikezela ngenkathalelo kwabagulayo.

src_text: e le ho ba hopola, ha re ipolokeng re be re boloke le baahi ba habo rona ka ho nka boikarabelo.
tgt_text: ukubakhumbula, masizigcine sikhuselekile kunye nabanye abemi bakuthi ngokudlala eyethu indima.

src_text: re tla e fenya kokwanahloko ena re be re se ahe botjha setjhaba sa habo rona.
tgt_text: siza kuyoyisa le ntsholongwane size silakhe ngokutsha uluntu lwethu.

src_text: re ile ra feta dinakong tsa lefifi la bonkantjana empa re ile ra di hlola.
tgt_text: siwabonile amaxesha awayengawonaanzima kodwa soyisa.

src_text: ha re se ke ra senyang ka matla a rona kapa sebete ha re ntse re sebetsa mmoho hopholosa maphelo.
tgt_text: imbeko ekhethekileyo kubasebenzi bethu benkathalelo yezempilo vukuzenzele unnamed inani lokusweleka okubangelwa yintsho longwane icorona kutsha nje lide ledlula kuphawu lwama2 000. phakathi kwabo bathe baphulukana nobomi babo ngabasebenzi bezempilo, abasebenzi abafezekileyo abebekhathalela abagulayo, kwaye bebeyinkxaso nentuthuzelo kwabo bebesesibhedlele besenziwa amakheswa kwiintsapho zabo.

src_text: motjha wa sehwai o fumana tshehetso ya covid19 silusapho nyanda sehwai se thuthuang sa kapa botjhabela ke e mong wa ba fotseng molemo letloleng la mmuso la kimollo ya kokwanahloko ya corona.
tgt_text: umlimi osemtsha ufumana inkxaso yecovid19 silusapho nyanda umlimi osahlumayo wasempuma koloni ngomnye wabantu abaxhamle kwingxowamali karhuluumente yesiqabu kwintsholongwane yecorona .

src_text: nomagcinandile suduka (27) o hodisa lefa le maruo a habo ka ho itahlela ka setotswana temothuong.
tgt_text: unomagcinandile suduka (one minyaka enga ma27) ukhulisa igama nobutyebi bosapho lwakhe ngokutyala imali kwezolimo.

src_text: monga 4 u and 4 me primary cooperative motsaneng wa mooiplaas o fumane tshehetso letloleng la kimollo ya kokwanahloko ya corona (covid19) la lefapha la temothuo, tlha bollo ya mobu le ntshetsopele ya mahae bakeng sa temothuo ya hae ya mahe, diphoofolo le meroho.
tgt_text: umnini we4 u and 4 me primary cooperative elalini yasemooiplaas ufumene inkxaso kwingxowamali yesiqabu yentsholongwane yecorona (icovid19) yesebe lezolimo, iinguqu kwezemihlala nophuhliso lwamaphandle ukwenzela ifama yakhe yamaqanda, imfuyo nemifuno.

src_text: lefapha le nanabeditse divaotjhara tsa boleng ba r1.2 bilione ho dihwai tse hlokang ka sebele.
tgt_text: isebe linikele ngeevawutsha ezixabisa imali eyibhiliyoni eyi1.2 yeerandi kubalimi abafuna uncedo.

src_text: suduka o re divaotjhara tsa hae di tla mo thusa ho hodisa karolo ya tlhahiso ya mahe kgwebong ya hae.
tgt_text: usuduka uthi iivawutsha zakhe ziza kumnceda ngokwandisa icala leshishini lakhe lemveliso yamaqanda.

src_text: "ke fuwe divaotjhara tse tharo tse etsang r19 000 ha di kopane.
tgt_text: "ndifumene iivawutsha ezintathu ezixabisa imali enga ma19 000 eerandi.

src_text: ke vaotjhara ya r12 000 ya ho reka dikgoho tsa mahe tse 100, ebe vaotjhara ya r6 500 ya ho reka dijo tsa dikgoho le vaotjhara ya r500 ya ho reka meriana".
tgt_text: ivawutsha yemali engama12 000 eerandi yokuthenga iinkukhu zamaqa nda ezili100, ivawutsha yama6 500 eerandi yokuthenga ukutya kweenkukhu kunye nevawutsha yama500 eerandi yokuthenga amayeza.

src_text: o qadile kgwebo ya hae ya tlhahiso ya mahe ka ho fepa dikgoho tsa habo tsa setho ka phepokgodiso e ntlafatsang ho behela, e di thusang hore di behele mahe le ha di sa kopana le mekoko.
tgt_text: "uqalise ifama yakhe yemveliso yamaqanda ngokondla iinkukhu zesixhosa zosapho lwakhe ngokutya kokuzenza zibe zinkukhu zamaqanda, nesenza ukuba zikwazi ukuzala amaqanda zingahlangenanga nenkunzi.

src_text: dikgoho tsa hae tse 50 jwale di behela mahe a 50 ka letsatsi mme o a rekisa ka beke le beke.
tgt_text: iinkukhu zakhe ezingama50 ngoku zizala amaqanda angama50 ngosuku, aze awathengise qho ngeveki.

src_text: suduka, ya ruileng le dipodi tse 73, dinku tse 25 le dikgomo tse 25, o qadile thuo ena ya hae ka 2015 kamora ho phethela dithuto tsa public management n6 certificate kholejeng ya thupelo le thuto ya mesebetsi ya matsoho (tvet) ya ikhala.
tgt_text: usuduka, ophinda afuye neebhokhwe ezingama73, iigusha ezingama25 neenko mo ezingama25, waqalisa ukufama ngowama2015 emva kokufumana isatifikethi sepublic management kun6 eikhala training and voca tional education and training college.

src_text: kamora ho elellwa hore ho na le leqeme la menyetla ya mesebetsi, o ile a qeta ka hore a nke temothuo ya habo ya ho jela hanong mme a e fetole hore e be kgwebo e nang le phaello.
tgt_text: emva kokufumanisa ukuba amathuba emisebenzi anqongophele, wenza isigqibo sokuthathela kuye umsebenzi wefama yosapho eyayilinyelwa ukuziphilisa ngoko ukuze ayiguqule ibe lishishini elifaka inzuzo.

src_text: suduka o re: "re hotse re sebetsa mesebetsi ya temo thuo, kahoo, kamora ho qeta dithuto ke ile ka qeta ka hore ke kene temothuong ho e na le ho tsoma mosebetsi."
tgt_text: usuduka uthi: "sikhule sifama, ngoko ke emva kokuphumelela kwizifundo zam ndenze isigqibo sokufama endaweni yokufuna umsebenzi."

src_text: ena e ile ya bonahala e le qeto e kgothatsang hobane jwale o se a ekeditse lenane la dipodi le la dikgomo.
tgt_text: esi sigqibo sizibonakalise njengesenkuthazo, kuba selekhulise iqela leebhokhwe neenkomo.

src_text: polasi ya suduka ya dihekthara tse tsheletseng e hlahisa poone, ditapole, dierekisi le dinawa.
tgt_text: ifama yemifuno kasuduka ezihektare ezintandathu ubukhulu ivelisa umbona, iitapile, iierityisi neembotyi.

src_text: poone e lengwa dihekthareng tse nne, ebe ditapole hekthareng e lenngwe mme dinawa le dierekisi di kopantswe hekthareng ya ho qetela.
tgt_text: umbona ulinywa kwiihektare ezine, iitapile kwihektare enye ukuze iierityisi neembotyi nazo zibe nehektare enye.

src_text: suduka o ithutile boholo ka covid19 , haholoholo ka hore matlotlo a hae a bohlokwahlokwa ke matsoho a hae esita le ho sebetsa ka thata .
tgt_text: usuduka ufunde okuninzi kwicovid19 , ngakumbi ngenxa yokuba eyona nto ibalulekileyo kweli shishini lakhe zizandla zakhe kunye nokusebenza nzima.

src_text: nomagcinandile suduka o fetotse temothuo ya lelapa la habo ya ho jela hanong hore e be kgwebo e nyenyane.
tgt_text: umlimi osemtsha ufumana inkxaso yecovid19 silusapho nyanda umlimi osahlumayo wasempuma koloni ngomnye wabantu abaxhamle kwingxowamali karhuluumente yesiqabu kwintsholongwane yecorona .

src_text: afrika borwa e nka dikgato tsa ho rarolla qaka ya kgaello ya dithusaphefumoloho silusapho nyanda sethusaphefumoloho se entsweng kwano lapeng se tla thusa bakudi ba nang le matshwao a fokolang a covid19 ho phefumoloha habobebe.
tgt_text: umzantsi afrika uthatha amanyathelo okulungisa ukudingeka kwezixhobo zokuphefumlisa silusapho nyanda isixhobo sokuphefumlisa esenziwe apha ekhaya siza kunceda izigulane ezineempawu ezingephi zecovid19 ukuba ziphefumle lula umlo wokulwa nesifo sentsholongwane icorona (covid19) emzantsi afrika womelezwe kukuveliswa kwesixhobo sokuphefumlisa sokuqala apha kweli lizweisixhobo sokuphefumlisa soxinzelelo oluluncedo kwimibhobho yomoya oluqhubekayo (icp ap) sinceda izigulane ezineempawu ezingephi zecovid19 ukuba ziphefumle lula ngokubonelela ngoxinzelelo lomoya onomongomoya okwinqanaba elingephi ukugcina imibhobho yazo yomoya ivulekile.

src_text: twantsho ya lefu la kokwanahloko ya corona (covid19) afrika borwa e matlafaditswe ke sethusaphefumoloho sa pele se entsweng kahara naha.
tgt_text: esi sixhobo sokuphefumlisa sayilwa libhunga lophandonzulu kwezobunzululwazi nezoshishino (icsir) ngentsebenziswano neqela labehlulelani balapha ekhaya kwaye siza kufezekiswa kweli lizwe jikelele kwizigulane ezibonakalisa iingxaki zokuphefumla kwizigaba zokuqala zosuleleko lwecovid19.

src_text: sethusaphefumoloho sa continuous positive airway pressure (cpap) se thusa bakudi ba nang le matshwao a fokolang a covid19 ho phefumoloha habobebe, ka ho fana ka kgatello e tlase ya moya o nang le oksijene e le ho boloka dipeipi tsa bona tsa moya di bulehile.
tgt_text: "umoya umntu awuphefumlayo ngokwesiqhelo unomongomoya ohlanganisiweyo oziipesenti ezingama23.

src_text: sethusaphefumoloho sena se radilwe ke lekgotla la diphuputso tsa saense le indasteri (csir) ka kopanelo le balekane ba bangatanyana ba kwano lapeng, mme se nanabetswa naha ka bophara ho bakudi ba bonahalang ba na le mathata a phefumoloho qalehong ya tshwaetso ya covid19.
tgt_text: umatshini wecp ap ungampompa umthamo ophezulu womongomoya, ukuncedisa umntu ukuba aphefumle.

src_text: "moya oo ka tlwaelo motho a o phefumolohang o na le sekepele sa dipheresente tse 23 tsa oksijene.
tgt_text: icp ap impompa umongomoya ohlanganisiweyo ngokuqhubekayo.

src_text: sethusaphefumoloho sa cpap se ka pompa sekepele se phahameng sa oksijene e le ho thusa motho hore a phefumolohe.
tgt_text: ungawandisa okanye uwunciphise umthamo womongomoya umntu awuphefumlela ngaphakathi," utsho umlawuli wesigqeba wecsir future production: manufacturing umartin sanne.

src_text: cpap e pompa motswako wa oksijene motjhaotjhele.
tgt_text: izigulane ezisebenzisa isixhobo sokuphefumlisa zinxulumanyiswa ngokuthi zinxityiswe isigqubuthelobuso.

src_text: o ka eketsa kapa wa fokotsa sekgahla sa oksijene eo motho a e phefumolohang," ho rialo molaodi wa phethahatso wa tlhahiso ya kamoso ya csir: manufacturing martin sanne.
tgt_text: umongomoya utsalwa kwitanki yegesi yomongomoya uze udityaniswe nomoya wendalo kwisixhobo sokuphefumlisa, ukusuka kulo ndawo ukuya kugqithiselwa kwisigqubuthelobuso uze uphefumlelwe ngaphakathi sisigulane.

src_text: bakudi ba sebedisang sethusaphefumoloho ba hokahantswe ke sekwahelasefahleho.
tgt_text: usanne uthi ukongeza ekumpontshweni komoya womongomoya, icp ap ikwanceda izigulane ukuba zikwazi ukuphefumlela ngaphandle.

src_text: oksijene e hulwa tankeng ya gase ya oksijene mme e tswakwa le moya wa tlhaho o kahara sethusaphefumoloho ebe ho tloha moo e fetisetswa ho sekwahelasefahleho mme mokudi o e phefumolohelwa kahare.
tgt_text: isixhobo sec pa p singasetyenziswa kwiimeko ezinobuchwepheshe obuxhome kakhulu bezonyango nakwiimeko zethutyana, ezifana nezibhedlele zethutyana nakumaziko okuvalela bucala.

src_text: sanne o re kahodimo ho ho pompa moya o nang le oksijene, cpap e boela e thusa bakudi ho phefumolohela ka ntle.
tgt_text: usanne uthi icsir kufanele ibe ivelise izixhobo zokuphefumlisa ezingama10 000 ekupheleni kweyethupha.

src_text: "sesebediswa sa cpap se ka sebediswa ditikolohong tsa bongaka ba botekgeniki bo phahameng esita le dibakeng tsa nakwana, tse kang dipetlele tse thokwana le metse esita le ditsheng tsa tshekeho.
tgt_text: ngokusebenzisana nabakwasiemens, abakwasimera, abakwaakacia, abakwagabler, umoya kunye neyunivesithi yasekapa (iuct), icsir ivelise icp ap ngokwemigangatho yombutho wezempilo wehlabathi (iwho).

src_text: sanne o re csir e tla be e se e hlahisitse dithusaphefumoloho tse 10 000 mafelong a phato.
tgt_text: iqela lokuqala lezi zixhobo zokuphefumlisa liza kunikezelwa kwizibhedlele zikarhulumente eziphantsi koxinzelelo ngenxa yokungabikho kwezixhobo zokuqubisana necovid19.

src_text: ka ho sebedisana hammoho le siemens, simera, akacia, gabler, umoya le yunivesithi ya cape town, csir e hlahisitse cpap ho ya ka maemo a beilweng ke mokgatlo wa lefatshe wa bophelo bo botle.
tgt_text: icsir iqalise ukusebenza ngecp ap emva kokuba ihlabathi liqalise ukufumana ukudingeka okukhulu kwezixhobo zokuphefumlisa.

src_text: lefupe la pele la dithusaphefumoloho le tla abelwa dipetlele tsa mmuso tse nang le kgatello ka lebaka la kgaello ya disebediswa tsa ho lwantsha covid19.
tgt_text: "malunga nenyanga yokwindla nekatshazimpuzi, kwasuka ngesiquphe kwakho ukungabikho ngokwaneleyo kwezixhobo zokuphefumlisa kubaboneleli bethu bezizwengezizwe.

src_text: csir e qadile ho sebetsana le cpap kamora hore lefatshe lohle le qale ho ba le kgaello e kgolo ya dithusaphefumoloho.
tgt_text: apho zazifumaneka khona, zazibiza kakhulu, ngoko ke urhulumente wakhupha isinikimaxabiso sokuveliswa kwezixhobo zokuphefumlisa," utsho usanne.

src_text: "e ne e ka ba nakong ya tlhakubele le mmesa moo ka tshohanyetso ho bileng le phepelo e fokolang ya dithusaphefumoloho ho tswa ho bafepedi ba rona ba matjhaba.
tgt_text: isinikimaxabiso ibiyinxalenye yeprojekthi yesizwe karhulumente yezixhobo zokuphefumlisa ngaphakathi kwesebe lezorhwebo, ushishino nokhuphiswano.

src_text: moo o neng o ka di fumana teng, di ne di le theko e phahameng haholo mme ka hona mmuso wa ntsha thendara ya tlhahiso ya dithusaphefumoloho," ho rialo sanne.
tgt_text: icsir ikwasebenza nangesixhobo sokuphefumlisa soxinzelelo oluluncedo kwimibhobho yomoya omanqanabamabini (ibilevel positive airway pressure) onjongo zawo zikukunceda izigulane ezineempawu ezibukhali kakhulu zecovid19.

src_text: thendara e ne e le karolo ya projeke ya naha ya dithusaphefumoloho kahare ho lefapha la kgwebisano, indasteri le tlhodisano.
tgt_text: umzantsi afrika uthatha amanyathelo okulungisa ukudingeka kwezixhobo zokuphefumlisa silusapho nyanda isixhobo sokuphefumlisa esenziwe apha ekhaya siza kunceda izigulane ezineempawu ezingephi zecovid19 ukuba ziphefumle lula umlo wokulwa nesifo sentsholongwane icorona (covid19) emzantsi afrika womelezwe kukuveliswa kwesixhobo sokuphefumlisa sokuqala apha kweli lizweisixhobo sokuphefumlisa soxinzelelo oluluncedo kwimibhobho yomoya oluqhubekayo (icp ap) sinceda izigulane ezineempawu ezingephi zecovid19 ukuba ziphefumle lula ngokubonelela ngoxinzelelo lomoya onomongomoya okwinqanaba elingephi ukugcina imibhobho yazo yomoya ivulekile.

src_text: thusa ho thibela ho ata ha covid19 vukuzenzele unnamed setjhaba sa habo rona se hlahetswe ke koduwa e kgolo ka ho fetisisa nalaneng ya demokrasi ya rona.
tgt_text: nceda unqande ukunwenwa kwecovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed isizwe sakuthi sijamelene neyona ntlekele inzima kakhulu kwimbali yedemokhrasi yethu.

src_text: ka matsatsi a kahodimo ho 120, re ile ra atleha ho diehisa ho ata ha kokwanahloko ena e bakang qomatsi lefatsheng lohle.
tgt_text: iintsuku ezingaphezulu kwezi120, siphumelele ekulibaziseni ukunwenwa kwale ntsholongwane izisa intshabalalo kwihlabathi jikelele.

src_text: empa jwale nako ya ho eketseha ha ditshwaetso tseo re ileng ra eletswa ka tsona ke ditsebi tsa rona tsa bongaka hore e tla fihla, jwale e fihlile.
tgt_text: kodwa ngoku, ukunyuka ngamandla kosuleleko esasicetyiswe ngako zingcali zethu zezonyango ukuba kuseza kuza, sekufikile.

src_text: maafrika borwa a kahodimo ho kotara ya milione a se a tshwaeditswe ke kokwanahloko ya corona, mme re a tseba le hore ditshwaetso tse ding tse ngata ha di a utollwa.
tgt_text: bangaphezulu kwekota yesigidi abantu basemzantsi afrika abosulelwe yintsholongwane icorona, kwaye siyayazi ukuba luseluninzi olunye usuleleko olungabonwanga.

src_text: ha jwale re ba le ditshwaetso tse ntjha tse kahodimo ho 12 000 letsatsi le letsatsi.
tgt_text: ngoku sibhalisa ngaphezulu kwama12, 000 ezehlo zosuleleko ezintsha yonke imihla.

src_text: haesale lefu lena le ne le qale ho ropoha ka tlhakubele, ke bonnyane ba batho ba 4 079 ba shweleng ka lebaka la covid19.
tgt_text: ukususela ukuqalisa kokuqhambuka kwayo kwinyanga yokwindla, ngabantu abangama4,079 ubuncinane abathe basweleka ngenxa yecovid19.

src_text: jwaloka maqhubu a mangata a mohatsela a parolang naha ya rona a hlaha ka borwa ho atlantic nakong ena ya selemo, ho na le dikgutlwana tse mmalwa naheng ya rona tseo kokwanahloko ya corona e sa tlo fihla ho hang ho tsona.
tgt_text: njengale ngqele iqhaqhazelisa amazinyo indlongozela ukungena kwilizwe lethu ivela kwiatlantic esemazantsi ngeli xesha lonyaka, imbalwa imimandla yeli lizwe eya kusinda kule ntsholongwane icorona.

src_text: sefefo sa kokwanahloko ya corona se kotsi ebile se ruthutha le ho feta kokwanahloko efe kapa efe eo re kileng ra e tseba.
tgt_text: uhlaselo lwentsholongwane icorona lukude le ngobukhali kwaye lutshabalalisa ngaphezulu kwalo naluphi na utshabalalo esakhe salwazi ngaphambili.

src_text: e monyolla mehlodi le ditjhelete tsa rona ho isa moo di fellang teng.
tgt_text: lutweza imithombo yethu kunye nokuthatha kwethu izigqibo kude kufikelele ekupheleni.

src_text: keketseho ya ditshwaetso tseo ditsebi le boramahlale ba rona ba ileng ba e lepa dikgweding tse kahodimo ho tse tharo tse fetileng, jwale e fihlile.
tgt_text: ukunyuka ngamandla kosuleleko ebeluthelekelelwe kwangaphambili zingcali noosonzululwazi bethu kwezi nyanga zi3 zidlulileyo, kude kwafika ke ngoku.

src_text: e qadile kapa bophirimela mme jwale e ntse e ata kapa botjhabela le gauteng.
tgt_text: kuqale entshona koloni kwaye ngoku kuyaqhubeka empuma koloni nasegauteng.

src_text: empa leha ditshwaetso di eketseha ka potlako hakaalo, ho bohlokwa ho tseba hore sekgahla sa ho shwa ha batho ba habo rona sa 1.5% ke se seng sa tse tlase ka ho fetisisa lefatsheng.
tgt_text: kanti, nangona usuleleko lukhula ngokucacileyo, kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuba izinga lethu lokusweleka leepesenti e1.5 liphakathi kwawona mazinga aphantsi ehlabathini.

src_text: sena ke papisong le sekgahla se tlwaelehileng lefatsheng lohle sa 4.4% ya batho ba shwang.
tgt_text: oku kuthelekiswa nomyinge wezinga lezehlo zokusweleka ehlabathini jikelele elikwiipesenti ezi4.4.

src_text: re na le palo ena e tlase ya mafu naheng ya rona ka lebaka la boiphihlelo le boikitlaetso ba diporofeshenale tsa rona tsa bophelo bo botle, esita le mehato ya tshohanyetso eo re e nkileng ho aha bokgoni ba tsamaiso ya rona ya bophelo bo botle.
tgt_text: sifanele ukubulela amava nokuzinikela kwamagcisa wethu wezonyango namanyathelo angxamisekileyo esiwathathileyo ukwakha amandla enkqubo yethu yezempilo ngala manani asezantsi okusweleka kwilizwe lethu.

src_text: leha boholo ba batho ba habo rona ba nkile dikgato tsa ho thibela ho ata ha kokwanahloko ena, ho na le ba bang ba sa itshwenyang ka ho etsa jwalo.
tgt_text: nangona uninzi lwabantu bakuthi bewathathile amanyathelo okuthintela ukunwenwa kwale ntsholongwane, bakhona abanye abangayenzanga loo nto.

src_text: ho na le ba bang kahara rona mona ba sa natseng melawana e beilweng ya ho kgina lefu lena.
tgt_text: bakhona abanye apha phakathi kwethu abangayihoyiyo imimiselo ephunyezelwe ukulwa esi sifo.

src_text: setsiketsing sa sewa sena, ho kena ka tekesing ho sa kenngwa sekwahelanko le molomo, mmoka wa ho teana le metswalle, ho ya meketjaneng kapa hona ho etela ba leloko, ho ka akofisa ho ata ha kokwanahloko ena habobebe ho be ho fete le maphelo a batho.
tgt_text: ebunzulwini bonje yena ubhubhane, ukukhwela iteksi ungasinxibanga isigqubuthelobuso, iindibano zabahlobo, ukuya kwiziyunguma okanye ukutyelela usapho, nako ngokulula kunokubangela ukusasazeka kwentsholongwane kunye nokuphulukana nobomi.

src_text: lena e ka nna ya eba lefu leo sesosa sa lona e leng kokwanahloko, empa lona le ata ka lebaka la boitshwaro ba batho.
tgt_text: esi ingasisifo esibangelwe yile ntsholongwane, kodwa sisasazwa yindlela abantu abaziphethe ngayo nendlela yokuziphatha.

src_text: ka diketso tsa rona, re le batho ka bomong, re le malapa, re le setjhaba, re ka kgona ebile re tlameha ho fetola ho ata ha sewa sena naheng ya rona.
tgt_text: ngenxa yamanyathelo wethu – njengomntu ngamnye, njengeentsapho, njengoluntu – sinakho kwaye kufuneka simtshintshile lo bhubhane kwilizwe lethu.

src_text: re lokela ho rwala sekwahelanko le molomo sa lesela se kwahelang nko le molomo kgafetsa ha re tloha malapeng.
tgt_text: kufanele sinxibe isigqubuthelobuso esenziwe ngelaphu esigquma iimpumlo nomlomo ngalo lonke ixesha siphuma ekhaya.

src_text: re lokela ho tswela pele ho hatlela matsoho a rona ka metsi le sesepa kapa ka sebolayadikokwanahloko kgafetsa .
tgt_text: kufuneka siqhubeke sihlamba izandla zethu rhoqo ngesepha namanzi okanye ngesibulalizintsholongwane.

src_text: re tlameha ho tswela pele ho hlwekisa le ho nyanyatsa bokahodimo ba dibaka tsohle, dibakeng tsohle tseo ho phetheselang setjhaba ho tsona.
tgt_text: kufuneka siqhubeke nokucoca size sifake nesibulalizintsholongwane kuyo yonke imiphezulu/imiphandle kuzo zonke iindawo zikawonkewonke.

src_text: taba ya bohlokwa ka ho fetisisa ke ya hore re tlameha ho siya sebaka se bolokehileng sa bonyane ba dimithara tse pedi dipakeng tsa rona le batho ba bang.
tgt_text: okona kubaluleke nangakumbi, kufuneka sigcine umgama wokuqelelana okhuselekileyo – ozimitha ezi2 ubuncinane – ukusuka kwabanye abantu.

src_text: jwale ho na le bopaki bo botjha ba hore kokwanahloko ena e ka nna ya fetiswa ka dikarolwana tse nyenyane haholo tse moyeng dibakeng tseo ho tsona ho subuhlellaneng batho, tse kwalehileng kapa tse nang le lephallo le fokolang la moya.
tgt_text: ngoku kukho ubungqina obuvelayo bokuba le ntsholongwane isenokuhamba njengamasuntswana amancinci emoyeni kwiindawo ezinabantu abaninzi, ezivaliweyo okanye ezingangeni kakuhle umoya.

src_text: ka lebaka lena, re tlameha ho ntlafatsa bokahare ba tikoloho ya dibaka tse phetheselang batho, moo kotsi ya tshwaetso e leng kgolo ka ho fetisisa.
tgt_text: ngenxa yeso sizathu kufuneka ngoko nangoko siphucule imo yangaphakathi kwiindawo zikawonkewonke apho umngcipheko wobungozi bosuleleko umkhulu kakhulu khona.

src_text: qeto ya rona ya ho phatlalatsa ho kginwa ha metsamao ya batho le ditshebeletso tseo e seng tsa mantlha naha ka bophara, e ile ya thibela sekgahla se hodimo sa keketseho ya ditshwaetso di sa tloha ha ditshebeletso tsa rona tsa bophelo bo botle di ne di so loke hantle, e leng ntho e neng e ka baka ho shwa ha batho ba bangata le ho feta.
tgt_text: isigqibo sethu sokubhengeza ukuvaleleka phantsi kwemiqathango ethile kwizwelonke sathintela ukunyuka ngamandla kosuleleko ngobuninzi ngexesha apho iinkonzo zethu zezempilo zazingekasilungeli esi simo, nento eyayinokukhokelela kweyona lahleko inkulu yokuphulukana nobomi.

src_text: ka nako eo re bileng le yona, re nkile mehato ya bohlokwa ya ho matlafatsa karabelo ya rona mabapi le bophelo bo botle.
tgt_text: kwixesha ebesinalo, sithathe amanyathelo abalulekileyo okomeleza indlela yethu yezempilo yokusabela.

src_text: re se re entse diteko tsa kokwanahloko ya corona tse kahodimo ho dimilione tse pedi mme basebeletsi ba setjhaba ba tsa bophelo bo botle ba se ba entse ditlhahlobo tse kahodimo ho dimilione tse 20. re fumane dibethe tse ka bang 28 000 tsa dipetlele bakeng sa bakudi ba covid19 ra ba ra aha dipetlele tse sebetsang tse thokwana le metse ho pharalla le naha.
tgt_text: senze uvavanyo lwentsholongwane icorona olungaphezulu kwezigidi ezimbini kanti ke oonompilo benze uhlolo olungaphezulu kwezigidi ezingama20.

src_text: jwale re na le dibethe tsa tshekeho tse kahodimo ho 37 000 ditsing tsa kokelo tsa poraefete esita le tsa setjhaba ho pharalla le naha, mme di malalaalaotswe ho tsheka bao ba sa kgoneng ho itsheka malapeng a bona.
tgt_text: sineebhedi ezingama28,000 esibhedlele ezilungele ukusetyenziswa zizigulane zecovid19 saze sakha izibhedlele zethutyana ezisebenzayo kwizwelonke.

src_text: re ile ra fumana ra ba ra fana ka dimilione tsa thepa ya boitshireletso dipetleleng, ditleliniking le dikolong ho pharalla le naha ho basebetsi ba habo rona ba tshwereng teu.
tgt_text: ngoku sineebhedi zokuvaleleka bucala ezingama37,000 kumaziko abucala namaziko karhulumente kwiizwelonke, ezilungele ukwenza amakheswa abo bangakwaziyo ukwenza njalo emakhayeni wabo.

src_text: re thaothile ebile re ntse re tswela pele ho thaotha baoki ba tlatsetso, dingaka le basebetsi ba ditshebeletso tsa tshohanyetso tsa bophelo bo botle.
tgt_text: sithenge saza sathumela izigidi zezixhobo zokuzikhusela emsebenzini kwizibhedlele, kwiiklinikhi kunye nasezikolweni kwizwelonke ukukhusela abasebenzi bethu abangabona baphambili edabini.

src_text: re tswela pele ho etsa kgatelopele mekutung ya rona ya ho lwantsha covid 19, empa phephetso ya rona e kgolo e sa ntse e tla.
tgt_text: siye saqasha kwaye siyaqhubeka nokufuna abongikazi, oogqirha nabasebenzi bakaxakeka bezempilo abongezelelweyo.

src_text: diprovenseng tsohle, re sebeletsa hore re boele re eketse lenane la diphaposi tse akaretsang tsa bakudi esita le hore dibethe tsa bohlokwa di fumanehe bakeng sa bakudi ba covid19.
tgt_text: siyaqhubeka nokwenza inkqubela kumalinge wethu okuqubisana necovid19, kodwa owona mcelimngeni mkhulu usengaphambili.

src_text: bokgoni ba diphaposi tsa bakudi bo ekeditswe dipetleleng tse ngata ka hore ho diehiswe tlhokomelo e sa potlakang hakaalo, le ho fetola dikarolo tse ding tsa sepetlele hore e be diphaposi tse ding tsa bakudi esita le ho aha kapa ho atolosa dipetlele tse thokwana le metse.
tgt_text: kuwo onke amaphondo, sime ngomumo ukwandisa ngakumbi inani leewadi zesiqhelo ezibhedlele kunye neebhedi zabagula kakhulu zezigulane zecovid19.

src_text: re sebetsana le ho eketsa phepelo ya oksijene, ya dithusaphefumoloho le thepa e nngwe bakeng sa bao ba tla hloka tlhokomelo e hlokolotsi, ho akga le ya ho faposwa ha phepelo ya oksijene e reretsweng mabaka a mang.
tgt_text: umthamo weewadi zesiqhelo ezibhedlele uphunguliwe kwizibhedlele ezininzi ngokuthi kulityaziswe kwabo badinga inkathalelo engangxamisekanga, ukuguqulwa kweendawo ezithile zesibhedlele ukuba zibe ngamacandelo ongezelelweyo wabagulayo nokwakhiwa okanye ukwandiswa kwezibhedlele zethutyana.

src_text: re sebedisa mekgwa ya theknoloji ya dijithale ho matlafatsa boitsebahatso, ho fofonela le ho kgethela ba ileng ba atamelana le batshwaetsuwa, esita le hona ho fana ka tshehetso ho bao diteko di reng ba fela ba na le tshwaetso.
tgt_text: sisebenzela ukwandisa ubonelelo lomongomoya, izixhobo zokuphefumlisa kunye nezinye izixhobo zabo badinga inkathalelo yabagula kakhulu, kuquka nokutshintsha ubonelelo lomongomoya ebelusetyenziselwa ezinye iinjongo.

src_text: ha e le mona re atamela sehlohlolong sa ditshwaetso, re lokela ho ba sedi haholo re be re tiise mehato e seng e le teng ya ho sisithehisa sekgahla sa tshwaetsano.
tgt_text: sifaka ubuchwepheshe bedijithali ukuqinisa indlela ekubonwa ngayo, ukulanda umkhondo nokwenziwa amakhweswa kwabo bebedibene nomntu osulelekileyo, kunye nokubonelela ngenkxaso kwabo uvavanyo lubafumanise bosulelekile.

src_text: melawana ya ho kenya dikwahelanko le molomo e tla matlafatswa.
tgt_text: njengokuba sisondela kwinkcochoyi yosuleleko, sidinga ukulumka ngakumbi size siqinise la manyathelo sele ekho ukuthomalalisa izinga lokusasazeka.

src_text: bahiri, beng ba mabenkele le baokamedi, balaodi ba dipalangwang tsa setjhaba, le baokamedi kapa beng ba moaho ofe kapa ofe oo ho phetheselang setjhaba ho ona, jwale ba tlangwa ke molao hore ba etse bonnete ba hore mang kapa mang ya kenang meahong kapa makoloing a bona, o tlameha ho kenya sekwahelanko le molomo.
tgt_text: imigaqo engokunxitywa kwezigqubuthelobuso iza kuqiniswa.

src_text: ditekesi tse potolohang haufinyane jwale di tla dumellwa ho eketsa sekepele sa bapalami hore di tlale tswete, ha ditekesi tsa maeto a malelele tsona di sa tlo dumellwa ho palamisa bapalami ba kahodimo ho lenane le etsang 70%, ha feela ho latelwa ditsamaiso tse ntjha tsa thibelo ya kotsi tse amanang le dikwahelanko le molomo, ho nyanyatsa makoloi ka dibolayadikokwanahloko le ho bula difenstere.
tgt_text: abaqashi, abanini zivenkile kunye nabalawuli, abaqhubi bezithuthi zikawonkewonke, kunye nabalawuli kunye nabanini baso nasiphi na isakhiwo sikawonkewonke bayanyanzelwa ngumthetho ukuba baqinisekise nabani na ongena kwizakhiwo zabo okanye izithuthi kufuneka esinxibile isigqubuthelobuso.

src_text: jwale ho na le bopaki bo totobetseng ba hore ho bulelwa ha thekiso ya jwala ho bakile kgatello e matla dipetleleng, ho kenyeletswa le diyuniting tsa dikotsi le tsa ba kulang haholo tsa icu, ka lebaka la dikotsi tsa makoloi, dikgoka le dikotsi tse amanang le tseo.
tgt_text: iiteksi ezihamba imigama emifutshane ngoku ziza kuvunyelwa ukuba ziwandise umthamo wazo wokukhwelisa i100 leepesenti, ngelixa ezihamba imigama emide zingavumelekanga ukuba ziwandise umthamo wama70 eepesenti, phantsi komqathango wokulandelwa kwemimiselo yokuthomalalisa umngcipheko omalunga nokunxitywa kwezigqubuthelobuso, ukucocwa kwezithuthi ngesibulalizintsholongwane kunye nokuvulwa kweefestile.

src_text: kahoo re entse qeto ya hore, hore re boloke bokgoni ba dipetlele, thekiso, le thomello le kanetso ya jwala e tla kwalwa hanghang.
tgt_text: ngoku kukho ubungqina obucacileyo bokuba ukuqaliswa kokuthengiswa kotywala kukhokelele ekubekweni kwezibhedlele zethu phantsi koxinzelelo olumandla, kuquka namacandelo abonzakeleyo kunye namacandelo abagula kakhulu (iicu), ngenxa yeengozi zeemoto, ubundlobongela kunye nokwenzakala okunxulumene nabo.

src_text: e le mohato o ekeditsweng wa ho fokotsa kgatello dipetleleng, ho tla ba le thibelo ya motsamao dipakeng tsa hora ya borobong bosiu le hora ya bone hoseng.
tgt_text: ngoko ke sithathe isigqibo sokuba khona ukuze sikwazi ukugcina umthamo wezibhedlele uphantsi, ukuthengiswa, ukusasazwa kunye nokuhanjiswa kotywala kuza kurhoxiswa ngoko nangoko.

src_text: re nka mehato ena re tseba hantle hore e qobella dithibelo tse sa amohelehang maphelong a batho.
tgt_text: njengenyathelo elongezelelweyo lokunciphisa uxinzelelo ezibhedlele, kuza kumiselwa ixesha lokuvaleleka ngendlu phakathi kwentsimbi ye9 ngokuhlwa nentsimbi yesi4 ekuseni.

src_text: empa leha ho le jwalo, mehato ena e a hlokeha hore re ipone re fetile sehlohlolong sa lefu lena.
tgt_text: siwathatha la manyathelo sikuqonda kakuhle ukuba abeka ubomi babantu phantsi kwezithintelo ezingamkelekiyo.

src_text: ha ho kamoo re ka se qobang kateng sefefo sena sa kokwanahloko ya corona.
tgt_text: noxa kunjalo, ayafuneka, ayimfuneko ukusinceda siphumele kweli xesha le nkcochoyi yesi sifo.

src_text: empa re ka e fokotsa tshenyo eo se ka e bakang maphelong a rona.
tgt_text: ayikho indlela esinokuthi siluphephe olu qhwithelo lwentsholongwane icorona.

src_text: re le setjhaba re ikentse kgokanyana phiri ka sepheo sa ho tshehetsana, ho tshedisa bao ba kulang esita le ho kgothaletsa kamohelo ya batho ba seng ba tshwaeditswe ke kokwanahloko ena.
tgt_text: kodwa singawuthothisa umonakalo le ntsholongwane enokuwenza kubomi bethu.

src_text: hona jwale, ho feta neng kapa neng, re na le boikarabelo ka maphelo a bao ba mathokong a rona.
tgt_text: njengesizwe sihlangene sonke ukuba sixhasane, sinike intuthuzelo kwabo bagulayo kunye nokukhuthaza ukwamkeleka kwabo baphila nale ntsholongwane.

src_text: re tla atleha ho a hlola maemo ana a boima.
tgt_text: ngoku, ngaphezulu kunangaphambili, sinoxanduva lobomi babo basingqongileyo.

src_text: re tla kgutlisetsa naha ya habo rona bophelong bo botle le katlehong.
tgt_text: siza kumelana nolu qhwithela.

src_text: re tla hlola.
tgt_text: nceda unqande ukunwenwa kwecovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed isizwe sakuthi sijamelene neyona ntlekele inzima kakhulu kwimbali yedemokhrasi yethu.

src_text: re keteka basadi ka kenyeletso re keteka basadi ka kenyeletso ya bona moruongya bona moruong vukuzenzele unnamed ka phato afrika borwa e keteteka kgwedi ya basadi.
tgt_text: ukubhiyozela abantu basetyhini ukubhiyozela abantu basetyhini ngokubabandakanya kuqoqoshongokubabandakanya kuqoqosho vukuzenzele unnamed ngenyanga yethupha umzantsi afrika ubhiyozela inyanga yabantu basetyhini.

src_text: keteko ena e tshwaya sehopotso sa letsatsi la 1956 ha basadi ba 20 000 ba ne ba hwanta mane union buildings – phallo e kgolokgolo ya batho ba basadi ba neng ba bua dipuo tse fapaneng, ba tswa dibakeng tse fapaneng mme e le ba merabe e fapaneng.
tgt_text: eli thuba liphawula isikhumbuzo samhla abasetyhini abangama20 000 ngowe1956 bathi benza umngcelele woqhankqalazo ukuya kwizakhiwo zomdibaniso – inyambalala yamakhosikazi athetha iilwimi ngeelwimi, ephuma kwiinkalo nakwiintlanga zonke.

src_text: ba ile ba kopana boitsekong ba bona ba ho fedisa melao ya dipasa e nyarosang le ho fumana tokelo ya bona ya ho phela tokolohong.
tgt_text: emanyene kwisinyanzeliso sawo sokupheliswa kwemithetho emibi yamapasi kunye nelungelo lawo lokuhlala enkululekweni.

src_text: boemo le maemo a basadiafrika borwa kajeno a se a fapane haholo ha o a bapisa le ao a neng a tobane le bomme le bonkgono ba rona ka 1956. re tswa hole hore re fihlelle afrika borwa e hlokang kgethollo ya merabe, kgethollo ya bong, e nang le demokrasi, e nang le katleho mme e lokolohile.
tgt_text: isimo nendawo abantu basetyhini ababekwa kuyo emzantsi afrika namhlanje yohluke kakhulu kunaleyo oomama noomakhulu bethu babejongene nayo ngowe1956.

src_text: ho bile le kgatelopele ya nnete ntlafatsong ya maphelo a basadi ba afrika borwa moruong, lekaleng la dipolotiki le phedisanong ya setjhaba.
tgt_text: sihambe indlela ende ekuphumezeni umzantsi afrika ongenacalucalulo ngokobuhlanga, ngokwesini, olawulwa ngokwentando yesininzi, ohlumayo nokhululekileyo.

src_text: le ha ho ntse ho le jwalo, re a tseba hore ho ntse ho ena le tse ngata tseo re tlamehang ho di fihlella.
tgt_text: kubekho inkqubela yokwenene ekuphuculeni ubomi babantu basetyhini basemzantsi afrika kwezoqoqosho, kwizinga lezepolitiki nakubomi bukawonkewonke.

src_text: basadi ba ntse ba tobana le kgethollo, tlhekefetso le ho ketekwa, mme ke bona ba futsanehileng ka ho fetisisa.
tgt_text: kwangaxesha nye, siyaqonda ukuba isende indlela ekusafanele siyihambile.

src_text: haeba ka nnete re batla fihlella tshepiso ya molaotheo wa rona re tlameha ho lwantshana le dikgato tse etsang hore basadi ba se kgone ho iketsetsa lekeno le dijthelete e leng tsona etseng hore basadi ba iphumane ba mamelletse tlhekefetso ho ketekwa.
tgt_text: abantu basetyhini basajongene nokucalulwa, impathombi nobundlobongela, kwaye basajongene nobunzima obukhulu bendlala.

src_text: re kene letsholong le itlhommeng pele le re kopantshang le maiteko a matjhabeng a ho fihlella tekatekano ya bong ka 2030. tekatekano ya moloko ke tabatabelo le phethoho ya ajenda ya ho fedisa kgethollo le dikgoka kgahlano le basadi le ho ba le seabo se tshwanang dipolotiking, le maphelong a bona le moruong.
tgt_text: ukuba ngaba sizimisele ekuphumezeni isithembiso somgaqosiseko, kufanele siloyisile uqoqosho nokukhetheka kwezezimali okwenza ukuba abantu basetyhini babe zizisulu zokuphathwa kakubi nobundlo bongela ngakumbi.

src_text: jwalo ka karolo ya letsholo lena, re kopantshitse ‘diketso tsa tshebedisano’ tse pedi, ya pele e leng ya tokoloho ya moruo le ditokelo mme enngwe ke e kgahlano le dikgoka ho basadi (gbv).
tgt_text: sizibandakanye nephulo eliqalayo ukubakho elisiqhagamshelanisa namalinge ehlabathi jikelele okuphumeza umakulingwane ngowesini ngowama2030.

src_text: bobedi mekotaba ena e hlokolotsi ho ajenda ya naha ya rona.
tgt_text: umakulingwane kwisizukuluwana yiajenda yebhongo neyenguqu yokuphelisa ucalucalulo nobundlobongela obugxile kwabasetyhini nokuthatha kwabo inxaxheba ngokulinganayo kubomi bezepolitiki, ezentlalo nobezoqoqosho.

src_text: dikgwedi tse 11 esale re phethahaditse moralo wa ketso tsa karabelo ya tshohanyetso ho lwantsha dikgoka tsa bong le dipolao tsa basadi (gbvf) re se re bile le kgatelopele ho atoloseng tshehetso le ho tsotella mahlatsipa, mme kgatelopele e entsweng ho tsa tlhabollo ya molao e ba nehela tshireletso e ngata haholo.
tgt_text: njengenxalenye yeli phulo, sizibandakanye ‘neendibanisela zokusebenza’ ezimbini, enye yeyobulungisa kwezoqoqosho namalungelo kunye nenye yokulwa ubundlobongela obugxile kwezesini.

src_text: kgwedi ya phato, re qala ka phethahatso ya moralo wa lewa la naha la ho lwantsha gbvf.
tgt_text: yomibini le mixholo ibaluleke kakhulu kuqobo lweajenda yethu yesizwe.

src_text: ntlha e ka sehlohlolong ya moralo ona ke ho netefatsa hore basadi ba bangata ba kenyeletswa boholo mo moruo.
tgt_text: sele izinyanga ezilishumi elinanye ukususela kwafezekiswa isicwangciso sokusebenza ukusabela kwimeko kaxakeka sokulwa ubundlobongela obugxile kwezesini nokubulawa kwabasetyhini ngamadoda senze inkqubela ekunabiseni inkxaso nenkathalelo kwabasindileyo, kwaye inkqubela iyenzeka kuhlaziyo lwezomthetho ukubanika ukhuseleko olukhulu.

src_text: sena ke hobane tlhokeho ya tekatekano ya moruo le tlhokeho ya tekatekano ya phedisano di a nyallana.
tgt_text: ngenyanga yethupha, siyaqala ukufezekisa isicwangciso sobuchule sesizwe ukulwa ubundlobongela obugxile kwezesini nokubulawa kwabasetyhini ngamadoda.

src_text: maemo a ditjhelete a basadi afrika borwa a ba beha kotsing e kgolokgolo ya tlhekefetso.
tgt_text: umba ongundoqo wesi sicwangciso usekuqinisekiseni ngokubandakanyeka kakhulu kwabantu basetyhini kwezezimali.

src_text: ka hoo, re tlameha ho tshehetsa basadi ho etsa hore ba kgone ho ikemela le ho iketsetsa tjhelete ya bona.
tgt_text: oku kungenxa yokuba ukungalingani kwezoqoqosho nokungalingani kwezentlalo kuyathungelana.

src_text: re entse boitlamo bo mmalwa tlasa tekatekano ya moloko e tla phethahatswang ka moralo wa lewa la naha.
tgt_text: isimo sezoqoqosho sabantu basetyhini emzantsi afrika sibenza babe zizisulu zokuphathwa kakubi ngakumbi.

src_text: ya pele, re tlo kenyeletsa seabo sa basadi moruong ka diphu mantsho tsa mmuso.
tgt_text: ngoko ke kufuneka siyinyusile inkxaso yabasetyhini ukubenza bakwazi ukuzimela ngokwezezimali.

src_text: re entse boipehelo ba ho netefatsa hore bonyane 40% ya dihlahiswa le ditshebeletso tse fumantshwang ke dikgwebo tsa mmuso di tswa dikgwebong tsa basadi.
tgt_text: senze iqela lezibophelelo phantsi kukamakulingwane kwisizukuluwana oko kuza kuqala ukucaca kwisicwangciso sobuchule sesizwe.

src_text: ya bobedi, re tlo eketsa tshehetso ya dikgwebo tse nyanyane, tse bohareng le tse kgolo (dismme) tse laolwang ke basadi mmoho le dikgwebo tse thuthuhang tse laolwang ke basadi kapa tsa basadi ba sa sebetseng.
tgt_text: okokuqala, siza kuqhuba ukubandakanyeka kwabantu basetyhini kuqoqosho ngenkqubo yentengo karhulumente.

src_text: hona ho tla kenyeletsa dipuisano le lekala la ditjhelete ho etsa hore ditshebeletso tsa ditjhelete di fumanehe ha bobebe ka theko e tlase ho basadi.
tgt_text: sesiwumisele umli nganiselo wokuqinisekisa ukuba ama40 eepesenti ubuncinane bempahla neenkonzo ezithengwa ngamaqumrhu karhulumente kufuneka zithengwe kumashishini wabantu basetyhini.

src_text: ya boraro, re batla ho netefatsa hore basadi ba bangata ba fumana thepa ya bohlokwa e jwalo ka lefatshe.
tgt_text: okwesibini, sizakuyinyusa inkxaso yamashishini amancinci aphakathi naphuhlayo (ismmes) wabantu basetyhini neyabantu basetyhini abasebenza kwicandelo elingekho sesikweni okanye abangaphangeliyo.

src_text: ho bohlokwa hore basadi ba fumane molemo ho tswa potlakisong ya ho kgutlisetswa lefatshe.
tgt_text: oku kuzakuquka nokudibana necandelo lezezimali ukwenza ukuba iinkonzo zezezimali zifikeleleke kwaye zingababizi kakhulu abantu basetyhini.

src_text: ho tshwanehile hore karolo ya r75 milione ya divaotjhara tsa matlole a dithuso a covid19 a tshwaetsweng tlhahiso ya temo 53% e be molemong wa basadi ba mahaeng.
tgt_text: okwesithathu, sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuba abantu basetyhini bayakwazi ukufikelela kwiimpahla ezivelisayo ezifana nomhlaba.

src_text: re tlameha ho netefatsa hore tshehetso ya basadi le rapolasi/mmapolasi ba ithuthuhang ba tswella ho fumantshwa tshehetso le ka mora sewa sena.
tgt_text: kubalulekile ukuba abantu basetyhini babe ngabaxhamli kwinkqubo yohlengahle ngiso lomhlaba ekhawulezileyo.

src_text: ya bone, re batla ho netefatsa hore basadi ba tshireletsehile kgahlano le gbv mesebetsing.
tgt_text: kubalulekile ukuba kwimali ezizigidi ezingamashumi asixhenxe anesihla nu seerandi zoncedo lwecovid19 ebekelwe bucala igalelo lezolimo ngeevawutsha ama53 eepesenti zabo bangabaxhamli iza kuba ngabantu basetyhini basemaphandleni.

src_text: ntlheng ena, re tla tswella ho sebetsa boemong ba naha le lebatowa ho tshwaela monwana seboka sa mokgatlo wa matjhaba (ilo) wa mosebetsi sadikgako le tlhekefetso mesebetsing.
tgt_text: kufuneka siqinisekise ukuba abantu basetyhini abangamafama okuzi philisa nawemithamo emincinci bayaqhubeka ukufumana inkxaso nasemva kwalo bhubhane.

src_text: ho thwe tokoloho ha e nehelwe, e ya nkwa.
tgt_text: okwesine, sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuba abantu basetyhini bakhuselekile kubundlobongela obugxile kwezesini kwindawo yempangelo.

src_text: tokollo ya basadi ke mantswe feela a pampering ntle le haeba e tsamaelana le boitlamo bo tswang ho makala ohle a setjhaba.
tgt_text: kule meko, siza kusebenza kwinqanaba lesizwe nelommandla ekusondeleni ukuqinisekisa ingqungquthela yombutho wezabasebenzi wezi zwengezizwe engobundlobongela nempathombi kwindawo yempangelo.

src_text: ha re itukisetsa kahobotjha ya moruo wa rona hara sewa sa kokwanahloko ya corona , re itse ha ho sa kgonanahale hore re ka kgutlela setlwaeding sa pele kokwanahloko e phahlalla.
tgt_text: kuthiwa inkululeko ayinikezelwa, kodwa iyathathwa.

src_text: re tlameha ho theha moruo o motheo wa ona o fapaneng ka, ho tse ding tsa dintho, ho ntlafatsa boemo ba leruo la basadi.
tgt_text: ukukhululeka kwabantu basetyhini kusephepheni nje kuphela ngaphandle kokuba kukhatshwa sisibophelelo esivela kuwo onke amacandelo oluntu.

src_text: hona ho bolela hore botsetedi ba moralo wa motheo bo tlameha ho tshehetsa eseng feela ntshetsopele ya indastri ya lehae, empa le dikgwebo tsa basadi.
tgt_text: njengokuba silungiselela ukwakha uqoqosho lwethu ekuqhambukeni kobhubhane wentsholongwane icorona , sathi asinokwazi ukuvela nje sibuyele apho besikho phambi kokuqhambuka kwale ntsholongwane.

src_text: e tlameha ho ikemisetsa ho theha menyetla ya mesebetsi molemong wa basadi mekgahlelong kaofela ya ho rala, ya ditjhelete, ya kaho le ya ho disa meralo ya motheo.
tgt_text: kufuneka sakhe uqoqosho olohluke ngokubalulekileyo neliza kuthi, phakathi kokunye, liphucule ngokubonakalayo indawo abakuyo abantu basetyhini.

src_text: ka mekgwa e tshwanang, re tla phahamisa mananeo a rona a khiro makaleng a mmuso, re tlameha ho netefatsa hore boholo ba dikgarabe e ba tsona tse thongwang.. hodima lekeno, mananeo ana a tla ba nehela monyetla wa ho fumana boitsebelo le boiphihlelo bo hlokehang ho kena moruong wa sehlohlolo.
tgt_text: oku kuthetha ukuthi kutyalomali lwethu kwiziseko ezingundoqo kufuneka singaxhasi nje uphuhliso kumashishini asekhaya kuphela, kodwa sixhase namashishini wabantu basetyhini.

src_text: le ha feela e le maikarabelo a mmuso ho nehela ka menyetla ya moruo ho basadi ho theha leano la tshebetso le tla bakang hore ho ntlafatswe tekatekano ya bong, bohle setjhabeng ba tlameha ho bapala karolo ya bona.
tgt_text: kufuneka ludalengabomi amathuba emisebenzi yabantu basetyhini kuwo onke amanqanaba okucwangcisa, elezezimali, elokwakha nokulungisa iziseko ezingundoqo.

src_text: dikgwebo di tlameha ho tshehetsa dikgwebo tsa basadi ka ho reka dihlahiswa le ditshebeletso dikgwebong tsa bona.
tgt_text: ngokomlinganiselo ofanayo, njengokuba sisenyusa iinkqubo zemisebenzi yethu karhulumente, kufuneka siqinisekise ukuba ngokukodwa abantu basetyhini abalulutsha bachongwa njengabathathi nxaxheba.

src_text: ba tlameha ho hira basadi ba bangata le ho thonya basadi ba bangata maemong a bolaodi.
tgt_text: ukongeza kwimivuzo, ezi nkqubo ziza kubabonelela ngethuba lokufumana izakhono ezithile namava adingekayo ukungena kuqoqosho lwesiqhelo.

src_text: sena se bohlokwa haholoholo ha o sheba direkoto tsa lekala la poraefete boemong ba kemedi ya bong e saletseng morao ha o bapisa le lekala la mmuso.
tgt_text: nangona iluxanduva lukarhulumente ukubonelela abantu basetyhini ngamathuba ezoqoqosho nokudala inkqubosikhokelo yokuxhasa ukuqhubela phambili ukulingana kwezesini, wonke umntu eluntwini udinga ukudlala indima yakhe.

src_text: bona ke bothata bo hlahellang kgafetsa dipuisanong tseo ke bileng le tsona le boholo ba mekgatlo ya dikgwebo tsa basadi.
tgt_text: abezoshishino kufuneka baxhase amashishini amancinci wabantu basetyhini ekuthengeni iimpahla neenkonzo.

src_text: hore ho be le tekatekano re tshwanetse ho fedisa setlwaedi sa mekgolo e e sa lekalekaneng ho ya ka hore motho ke monna kapa mosadi, mme re itlwaetse ho lefa batho ba entseng mosebetsi o tshwanang ka ho lekalekana jwalo ka ho totobaditswe molaong wa tekatekano ya mese betsing.
tgt_text: kufuneka baqeshe abantu basetyhini abongezelelweyo baze banyusele abantu basetyhini abongezelelweyo kwizikhundla zezolawulo.

src_text: basadi ba tlameha ho tshireletswa kgahlano le tlhekefetso le kgethollo mosebetsing.
tgt_text: oku kubaluleka ngakumbi xa uqwalasela ukuba imbali yecandelo labucala ekumelweni kwesini kwinqanaba lezikhundla zezolawulo litsala emva kunecandelo likarhu lumente.

src_text: ke boikarabelo ba batsamaisi ba dipalangwang, ba tsamaiso ya diyunivesithi, makgotla a taolo ya dikolo le mekgatlo ya tumelo ho theha maemo a tshireletsehileng molemong wa basadi le bananyana ha ba le maetong, dithutong le dikerekeng.
tgt_text: lo ngumba ophakanyiswa izihlandlo ngezihlandlo kuthethathethwano endilubamba nemibutho yezoshishino yabantu basetyhini.

src_text: re tlameha ho hatelapele ka maiteko a rona a ho qeta kgatello ka banna, kgethollo ya basadi le ho fa banna maemo a ho ba dihloho.
tgt_text: ngokufanayo, kufuneka sikuphelisile ukungalingani okugxile kwisini kwimivuzo yamadoda neyabantu basetyhini, size sisebenzise imigomo yokuhlawula umvuzo olinganayo ngomsebenzi ofanayo oqulathwe kumthetho womakulinganwe emsebenzini.

src_text: ke mehopolo ena e bakang kgatello ya basadi.
tgt_text: abantu basetyhini kukwafuneka bekhuselwe ekuphathweni kakubi nakucalucalulo emsebenzini.

src_text: ho ho rona – banna le basadi bobedi – ho netefatsa hore boleng ba mosadi, boemo le maikutlo a hae ha a ka tlase ho a monna.
tgt_text: kuxhomekeke kubanikazi bezothutho, abalawuli beedyunivesithi, iibhodi ezilawulayo ezikolweni kunye nemibutho yezenkolo ukudala iimeko ezilungiselela abantu basetyhini namantombazana ukuba ahambe, afunde aze akhonze ngokukhuselekileyo.

src_text: ke boikarabelo ba rona jwalo ka batswadi le bonkgono le bontatemoholo ho tshwarwa le ho hodisa bara le baradi ka mokgwa o tshwanang.
tgt_text: kufuneka siqhubele phambili ngamalinge wethu okukuncothula ukudlisela ngobudoda ngokugqithisileyo, ukuthathela phantsi abantu basetyhini nogonyamelo lwabasetyhini ngamadoda.

src_text: ho ho rona jwalo ka banna ho hana le ho bua kgahlano le diketso tsa gbv moo re di bonang, le haeba ke kgahlano le metswalle, bontate le boabuti ba rona.
tgt_text: kuxhomekeke kuthi – sisonke amadoda nabasetyhini – ukungqina ukuba ixabiso lomntu wasetyhini, isikhundla akuso neembono zakhe azikho ngaphantsi kwezomntu oyindoda.

src_text: ha re beng moloko o tla fedisang kgatello ya basadi ka tsela efe kapa efe, nakong ya rona.
tgt_text: kuxhomekeke kuthi njengabazali noomawokhulu ukubaphatha nokubakhulisa ngendlela efanayo oonyana neentombi zethu.

src_text: moloko wa 1956 o ile wa itseka molemong wa rona bohle.
tgt_text: kuxhomekeke kuthi njengamadoda ukubuphikisa size sibugxeke ubundlobongela obugxile kwezesini nanini na xa sibubona, nkqu nokuba benziwa ngabahlobo bethu, ootata okanye abantakwethu.

src_text: re ba kolota seo, ho ho rona le ho meloko e tlang hore re se nyedisi lefa lena le kgabane.
tgt_text: ukubhiyozela abantu basetyhini ukubhiyozela abantu basetyhini ngokubabandakanya kuqoqoshongokubabandakanya kuqoqosho vukuzenzele unnamed ngenyanga yethupha umzantsi afrika ubhiyozela inyanga yabantu basetyhini.

src_text: ha re bolokaneng vukuzenzele unnamed naha ya bo rona e se e fetetse mo hatong wa bobedi wa tlhokomediso karabe long ya rona ho sewa sa kokwanahloko ya corona .
tgt_text: masigcinane sikhuselekile vukuzenzele unnamed ilizwe lethu lehlele kwinqanaba lokulu mka lesi2 kwimpe ndulo yethu kubhu bhane wentsholongwa ne icorona .

src_text: sena se tlile e le kimollo ho maafrika borwa ka ofela a neng a tshwanela ho phela tlasa dithibelo tse matla bakeng sa dikgwedi tse tsheletseng tse fetileng.
tgt_text: oku kuni ke uninzi lwabantu basemzantsi afrika abe behlala phantsi kwemi qathango engqongqo kwezi nyanga zintlanu zidlulileyo isiqabu.

src_text: ke letshwao la kgatelopele eo re e etsang mabapi le ho fokotsa ditshwaetso tse ntjha le boima hodima ditsha tsa rona tsa kalafo.
tgt_text: olu luphawu lwenkqubela esiyenzayo ekunciphiseni usuleleko olutsha nomthwa lo kumaziko wenkathalelo yezonyango wethu.

src_text: e boetse ke ntshetsopele ya bohlokwa jwaloka ha re tsitlallela ho qala botjha moruo wa rona.
tgt_text: ikwayi nkqubela phambili ebalu leke kakhulu njengokuba sizamela ukuqalisa ngoqo qosho lwethu.

src_text: feela e sa le hoseng hore re ka keteka.
tgt_text: kodwa kusekutsha kakhu lu ukuba singakubhiyozela oku.

src_text: re ntse re le mahareng haholo a sewa sena se bolayang se seng se fetile ka maphelo a fetang 11 000 ka hara afrika borwa feela.
tgt_text: sisesembindini wobhubha ne obulalayo osele uthathe imiphefumlo engaphezulu kwe11 000 kumzantsi afri ka nje wodwa.

src_text: re iphumana re na le di tlaleho tse etsang halofo ya milione tse tiiseditsweng, re ntse re na le ditshwaetso tse maemong a bohlano tse phahameng ka ho fetisisa lefatsheng.
tgt_text: kwizehlo zosuleleko ezingaphezulu kwesiqingatha sesigidi ezi ngqiniweyo, sisekwindawo yesihlanu ubuninzi bosule leko ehlabathini.

src_text: ho ntse ho na le monyetla wa hore lefu lena le ropohe botjha.
tgt_text: kwaye akusoloko ekhona wona amathuba wokuba esi sifo singaphinda sivuke kwa khona.

src_text: haeba re batla se re hopo tsang ka botlalo hore re lokele ho fadimeha, ke hore re shebe se etsahetseng dikilomithara tse dikete hole le rona e leng naheng ya new zealand.
tgt_text: ukuba ngokuyinene sidi nga ukuzikhumbuza nge mfuno yokuba sihlale sipha phile, kufanele sikhangele kwizehlo zakutsha nje ku mgama ongamawaka nga mawaka weekilomitha kude le enew zealand.

src_text: dikgwedi tse tharo esale naha eo e tsebahatsa hore ha e sa na kokwanahloko ya corona , new zealand e boetse e hlasetswe ke ho kginwa ha ditshebeletso hape.
tgt_text: kwisithu ba nje seenyanga ezintathu emva kokuba ela lizwe libhe ngezwe njengelingenayo intsholongwane icorona , inew zealand kwakhona ikwisimo sokuvaleleka phantsi kwemiqathango ethile.

src_text: leha ho ropoha ha moraorao e ne e le ha ditlaleho tse mmalwa, mmuso oo o ile wa potlakela ho kenya dithibelo tshebe tsong hape.
tgt_text: nangona okwakutsha nje ukuqhambuka kwakho na kwale ntsholongwane kube zizehlo nje ezimbalwa, urhulumente ukhawulezise wamisela kwakhona imi qathango yokuvaleleka pha ntsi kwemiqathango ethile.

src_text: dithibelo tse tshwanang le tseo di ile tsa lokela ho kenngwa tshebetsong hape dikarolong tse mmalwa tsa yuropa kaha di ile tsa hlaselwa ke ‘leqhubu la bobedi’ la ditshwaetso.
tgt_text: imiqathango efanayo kuye kwanyanzeleka imiselwe kwakhona kwimimandla eliqela yaseyurobhu nje ngokuba baye beva ‘umsi nga wesibini’ wosuleleko.

src_text: diketsahalo tsena di bontsha feela kamoo dintho di ka fetohang ka potlako ha re tla tabeng ya covid19 .
tgt_text: la mava abonakalisa nje ukuba izinto zitshintsha msinya kangakanani na ngoku bhekisele kwicovid19 .

src_text: sena ke tlhokomediso ho rona ba ntseng ba ithetsa ka hore re se re le haufi le ho bona pheletso ya bothata bona ba maemo a hlobae tsang bophelong ba setjhaba.
tgt_text: sisilumkiso eso kuye naba ni na onemibono yokubona into engekhoyo yokuba sesisondele esiphelweni sokuba kwimo enzima kaxa keka kumaziko wezempilo kawonkewonke.

src_text: ehlile ho na le matshwao a tlisang tshepo.
tgt_text: ngokuqinisekileyo, zikho na iimpawu zethemba zona.

src_text: palo ya ditlaleho tse ntjha tse tiiseditsweng ka hara afrika borwa e ntse e tswella ho theoha.
tgt_text: inani lezehlo ezitsha zosule leko ezingqiniweyo emza ntsi afrika ziyaqhubeka ukwehla.

src_text: sehlohlolong sa lefu lena kgweding e le nngwe feela e fetileng, re ne re ba le ditlaleho tse ntjha tse ka fihlang ho 12 000 ka letsatsi.
tgt_text: ngexesha sisenco tsheni yovuthondaba lwesi sifo kwinyanga nje enye edlu lileyo, besibhalisa malunga ne12 000 lezehlo ezitsha zo suleleko ngosuku.

src_text: sena se theohetse ho palohare ya bonyane 5 000 ka letsatsi bekeng ena e fetileng.
tgt_text: oku kuye kwehla kwafika kumyinge omalunga nama5 000 ngo suku kule veki idlulileyo.

src_text: sekgahla sa rona sa ho hlaphohelwa se eme ho 80%.
tgt_text: izinga lethu lokuphucuka lumi kuma80 eepesenti.

src_text: jwaloka ha naha e fetela mohatong wa bobedi wa tlhokomediso, dithibelo tse ngata tsa diketsahalo tsa kahisano le tsa moruo di nyehlisitswe.
tgt_text: njengokuba ilizwe lehlele kwinqanaba lokulumka lesi2, imiqathango emi ninzi kwiintshukumo ze zolonwabo nezoqoqosho isusiwe.

src_text: sena se tla tla ka kotsi ya ho eketseha ha ditshwaetso.
tgt_text: oku kuhambelana nokwanda komngcipheko wokusasazeka.

src_text: jwale re lokela ho laola kotsi ena le ho netefatsa hore seo re se fihletseng ho fihlela mona mabapi le ho laola ho ata ha sewa sena ha se re kgutlisetse morao.
tgt_text: ngoku kufanele siwu lawule umngcipheko size siqinisekise ukuba iinzuzo esele sizizuzile ukuza ku tsho ngoku ekulawuleni ukunwena kwalo bhubhane asizibuyiseli mva.

src_text: tshoso e matla ka ho fetisisa bophe long ba setjhaba hajwale ke ho itebala.
tgt_text: esona soyikiso sikhulu kwimpilo yelungelo lesizwe ngoku kukwaneliseka.

src_text: e ka nna ya ba re dumeletswe ho etela me tswalle le ba malapa, ho ya dibakeng tsa boithabiso, ho tsamaela monate le ho nwa tahi le ho ya direstjhure nteng, dibareng le ditame neng.
tgt_text: kuseno kuba sivumelekile ngoku ukuba sidibane nabahlobo neentsapho, siye kwiindawo zokuzonwabisa, sihambele ulonwabo nokusela utywala kwiindawo zokutyela, iibha ri neethaveni.

src_text: feela maele a kgale a re, ho kgona, ha ho bolele ho tlameha.
tgt_text: kodwa ke njengoko lisi tsho iqhalo lakudala, into yokuba uyakwazi, ayithethi ukuba kufanele wenze.

src_text: batho ba bangata ba nang le kokwanahloko ya corona ha ba na matshwao mme ha ba tsebe le hore ba na le tshwaetso.
tgt_text: uninzi lwabantu aba nentsholongwane icorona ababinazo iimpawu kwaye basenokungayazi nokuba bosulelekile.

src_text: sena ke nnete e tshosang hobane se bolela hore mang le mang e ka nna ya ba o na le tshwaetso mme a ka tshwaetsa ba bang ntle le maikemisetso.
tgt_text: le yinyaniso ezolisayo kuba oku kuthetha ukuba nabani na apha kuthi usenokuba wosulelekile ngoku sithethayo kwaye usenokuba wosulela abanye engaqondanga.

src_text: sena e ka ba ntho e etsa halang ha motho a etela ba leloko, haholoholo ba seng ba hodile le ba ntseng ba tshwerwe ke mafu a mang a ka etsang hore ba tshwae tsehe ha bonolo.
tgt_text: oku kungenzeka ngoku kodwa xa ehambele izihlobo, ingakumbi abantu abadala kunye nabo banezigulo abaphila nazo ezibenza babe sesichengeni sokosuleleka lula.

src_text: ho boetse ho jwalo ka ho ya ditshebe letsong tsa bodumedi kapa mesebetsing ya botjhaba.
tgt_text: kukwayinyaniso uku ba naxa beye kwimisebenzi yezenkolo okanye yezenkcu beko.

src_text: ‘leqhubu la bobedi’ la ditshwaetso leo dinaha tse ding tse mmalwa di bileng le lona ke kgonahalo e dulang e le teng ya hore le rona le ka re fihlela.
tgt_text: ‘umsinga wesibini’ wo suleleko athe amazwe ama ninzi awuva yinto eyaku hlala inokwenzeka nakuthi.

src_text: leha ho nyehlisitswe dithibelo tse ngata, ha ho bolele hore di keke tsa kgutla haeba ho ka ba le ho phahama ho matla ha ditshwaetso.
tgt_text: nangona imiqathango emininzi irhoxisiwe, oko akuthethi ukuba ayinoku phinda ibuye xa sinoku phinda sehlelwe kukunyuka okukhulu kosuleleko.

src_text: sewa sena ke taba ya bophelo le lefu.
tgt_text: lo bhubhane yinto yokuphila nokufa.

src_text: re lokela ho se tlwaela le ho dula re fadimehile.
tgt_text: sidinga ukuziqhela nisa kwaye sidinga ukuba sihlale siphaphile.

src_text: matsatsing a tlang, dibekeng le dikgweding tse tlang, re lokela ho tsepamisa maikutlo ka matla maite kong a ho hlaphohelwa.
tgt_text: kwezi ntsuku, iiveki nee nyanga ezizayo, kufuneka sigxile ngokungxamiseki leyo kumalinge wethu oku phila.

src_text: moruo wa rona le setjhaba di thefulehile haholo.
tgt_text: uqoqosho noluntu lwethu luchaneke kakhulu.

src_text: jwalo ka ha re kgutlela mesebe tsing ya moruo ho phatlalla le diindasteri kaofela – mme re ilo sebetsa le ho lokisa moo ho senyehileng – re na le boikarabelo ba hore re se itebale jwaloka batho ka bo mong, bahiri, badudi, malapa, ditsebi, basebetsi le baahi.
tgt_text: njengokuba sibuyela kwii ntshukumo zezoqoqosho phantse kuwo onke ama shishini – nokusebenzela ukulungisa umonakalo owenzekileyo – sinoxanduva lokuba singayekeleli umxa katho umntu ngamnye, abaqeshi, uluntu, iintsapho, amagcisa ezemisebenzi, abasebenzi nabemi.

src_text: ha ho le ya mong wa rona ya batlang ho kgutlela ma tsatsing a pele a ho kginwa ho matla ha ditshebeletso le metsamao ya batho.
tgt_text: akukho namnye kuthi ofu na ukubuyela kweza ntsuku zokuqala zemiqathango engqongqo yokuvaleleka phantsi kwemiqathango ethile.

src_text: re batla ho tswela pele ka maphelo a rona.
tgt_text: sifuna ukuqhu bela phambili nobomi bethu.

src_text: re batla ho bona me tswalle le baratuwa ba phe tse hantle le ho bolokeha.
